DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose study develop implement effective intervention program design prevent treat obesity young child .
DOC.brief_title: An Interactive Web-based Intervention Achieve Healthy Weight Young Children
DOC.detailed_description: Study procedure intervention : Pre-intervention : full-day training occur physician nurse clinic site train `` champion '' counsel . Intervention : A letter introduction mail potential subject whose child see last 6 month well-child exam whose BMI great equal 85th percentile . After informed consent obtain , subject randomize intervention control group . One parent may join study . Groups 10 12 parent overweight obese 3 6 year old meet weekly 6 week 5:30 6:30 pm `` nurse champion '' primary care office . Topics present discussed include authoritative parenting , use food plan `` Go , Slow , Whoa '' , increase physical activity , behavior change strategy . Sessions audiotaped independently audit confirm program fidelity . Parenting skill discuss every session . The intervention group access website . This site include information service ( instant library health topic related nutrition physical activity answer frequently ask question ) , web link pre-screened source information nutrition physical activity , local resource current activity child family , personal story ( emphasize authoritative parenting ) , interactive discussion group Ask Expert ( question answer within 48 hour usually sooner ) .
DOC.criteria: one parent 36 year old child BMI great equal 85th percentile Internet access English speaking Children developmental disorder Children chronic underlying disease may contribute obesity Children take medication may interfere healthy weight
DOC.keyword: Comprehensive Health Enhancement Support System ( CHESS )
